name: Support-Intake-Agent
role: Intelligent first-line support intake & triage
responsibilities: Ingest customer queries from all channels (email, chat, social)
Apply NLP to classify intent, sentiment, and urgency
Enrich ticket with customer order history and metadata from CRM
Route enriched ticket to the appropriate specialist queue or automated workflow
runbook_summary: Upon receiving a query, classify intent using a fine-tuned model. Fetch customer context from Salesforce. Route to the correct Jira queue based on intent (e.g., 'Refunds', 'Technical'). Escalate high-urgency tickets to PagerDuty.
sla: 99% of tickets triaged and routed within 5 minutes

name: Refund-Speed-Optimizer
role: Automated refund verification and execution engine
responsibilities: Validate refund eligibility against business policies (e.g., return window)
Check for potential fraud signals
Trigger payment provider refunds via API
Notify customer of refund status at each step
Update order state in master database
runbook_summary: Verify policy -> call fraud scoring API -> execute refund via Stripe/PayPal -> update order DB -> reconcile ledger -> notify customer via SendGrid.
sla: 95% of eligible refunds issued within 1 hour of approval

name: Product-Feed-Publisher
role: High-availability product feed syndication
responsibilities: Transform internal product catalog into multiple marketplace-specific formats (Amazon, Google Shopping)
Maintain real-time inventory level synchronization
Monitor feed acceptance status and automatically retry on transient failures
Track and alert on data drift between catalog and marketplaces
runbook_summary: On catalog change, validate schema against target spec -> generate feed file -> publish via API -> monitor response. On error, retry with exponential backoff. If persistent, create a high-priority ticket.
sla: 99.9% successful sync for price/inventory changes within 5 minutes

name: CAC-Analyzer
role: Real-time Customer Acquisition Cost optimization
responsibilities: Ingest campaign spend and conversion data from all ad platforms
Compute CAC and LTV/CAC ratios by channel, campaign, and cohort
Utilize predictive models to recommend budget reallocations for maximizing ROI
Generate automated alerts for significant performance changes
runbook_summary: Aggregate spend & conversions from Fivetran -> run dbt models for attribution and CAC calculation -> surface insights in Looker -> send Slack alerts for anomalies.
sla: Daily reports generated by 8 AM local; real-time alerts for >15% CAC variance

name: Conversion-Rate-Guard
role: Proactive checkout funnel monitoring and experimentation
responsibilities: Continuously monitor key funnel conversion rates (e.g., add-to-cart, checkout-start)
Automatically detect statistically significant regressions
Trigger pre-configured A/B test experiments to isolate and resolve issues
Collect and analyze experiment data to determine winners
runbook_summary: On regression detection via Statsig, run a narrow, pre-approved A/B test (e.g., rollback a recent UI change for 5% of users). If the test is positive, auto-generate a PR for rollback.
sla: Detect conversion drops within 5 min; auto-start diagnostic experiment within 15 min

name: Refund-Reconciliation-Agent
role: Automated financial ledger reconciliation for refunds
responsibilities: Compare refund records from payment gateways with internal finance ledger
Automatically flag any discrepancies in amount or status
Generate adjustment entries for known, safe scenarios (e.g., currency fluctuations)
Create detailed daily reconciliation reports for the finance team
runbook_summary: Daily batch job compares Stripe settlement reports against the finance ledger. If discrepancy >0.1%, create a JIRA ticket and assign to Finance Ops for manual review.
sla: Daily reconciliation report delivered by 9 AM local time

name: Returns-Logistics-Orchestrator
role: Automate and optimize the entire reverse logistics lifecycle
responsibilities: Process approved Return Merchandise Authorizations (RMAs)
Dynamically schedule pickups with logistics partners via API
Optimize pickup routes and batching to reduce costs
Track return shipments in real-time
Update RMA status upon warehouse receipt and inspection
Trigger restocking or quality control workflows
runbook_summary: On RMA approval, query partner APIs for pickup availability. Schedule and dispatch pickup, providing real-time tracking to customer. Upon warehouse receipt, update RMA and trigger appropriate inventory workflow (restock, QC, disposal).
sla: 98% of pickups scheduled within 24 hours of RMA approval

name: Seller-Portal-Assistant
role: Automated seller onboarding and success manager
responsibilities: Automate seller Know Your Customer (KYC) document verification using OCR and validation APIs
Provide sellers with personalized performance dashboards and growth tips
Proactively identify and notify sellers of listing violations or opportunities
Route complex seller issues to human success managers with full context
runbook_summary: Auto-verify docs via third-party API. If verification fails, create a case for manual review. Once onboarded, enroll seller in automated weekly performance email sequences.
sla: 75% of sellers onboarded (KYC verified) within 24 hours

name: Content-Automator
role: Automated product content and documentation generation
responsibilities: Monitor git commits for API changes and auto-generate draft release notes
Scan OpenAPI specs to create or update API documentation stubs
Analyze documentation site search queries to suggest new content or improvements
runbook_summary: On a new release tag, parse commit messages since last tag. Draft release notes and open a PR in the docs repo for review by the technical writing team.
sla: Draft release notes PR created within 1 hour of a new release tag

name: Churn-Predictor
role: Proactive churn prediction and retention workflow automation
responsibilities: Score all active accounts daily using a predictive churn model (features: usage, support tickets, billing events)
Automatically enroll high-risk accounts into pre-defined retention campaigns (e.g., email sequence, in-app offer)
Create high-priority tasks in the CSM's CRM for at-risk enterprise accounts
runbook_summary: Daily job computes risk scores. If score > 0.8 for an enterprise account, create a Salesforce task for the assigned CSM with context. For SMBs, trigger a Marketo email sequence.
sla: Nightly risk scores updated for all accounts; critical CSM alerts within 1 hour of detection

name: Onboarding-Flow-Engine
role: Personalized user activation and onboarding journey manager
responsibilities: Guide new users through a multi-step, personalized onboarding sequence
Track user progress towards key activation milestones (e.g., 'first project created')
Trigger contextual in-app messages or emails to nudge users who are stuck
Run A/B tests on different onboarding flow variants to optimize activation rates
runbook_summary: Start onboarding sequence on signup. If a user has not reached 'activation milestone 1' within 48 hours, trigger a targeted email with a helpful guide or video tutorial.
sla: Initial onboarding message sent within 5 minutes of signup

name: Billing-Orchestrator
role: Automated billing, invoicing, and revenue recognition
responsibilities: Generate accurate monthly/annual invoices based on subscription and usage data
Automate payment collection and retry failed payments with smart dunning logic
Ensure proper revenue recognition in compliance with accounting standards
Sync all billing and payment data with the accounting system (e.g., NetSuite)
runbook_summary: On payment failure, begin a 4-step dunning email sequence over 14 days. After 3 failed retries, suspend the account and create a ticket for manual collections.
sla: Invoice generation within 1 hour of the start of a new billing cycle

name: Feature-Flag-Manager
role: Intelligent and safe feature rollout coordinator
responsibilities: Manage feature flag configurations for phased rollouts (e.g., internal, beta, GA)
Continuously monitor key health metrics (error rates, latency) for features under rollout
Automatically roll back a feature flag if critical error rates exceed a defined threshold
Ensure consistency of feature flags across different services
runbook_summary: During a 10% canary rollout, if the associated feature's error rate spikes by >500%, automatically disable the feature flag via LaunchDarkly API and alert the on-call engineer.
sla: Automated rollback initiated within 2 minutes of a critical health metric breach

name: MRR-Forecaster
role: Predictive MRR forecasting and analysis
responsibilities: Ingest real-time billing, churn, and new booking data
Run predictive time-series models to forecast end-of-month MRR
Produce detailed dashboards with sensitivity analysis (e.g., impact of 1% churn change)
Alert finance leadership on significant deviations from the forecast
runbook_summary: Update forecast daily using an ARIMA model. If the projected month-end MRR deviates from the plan by more than 5%, send a detailed alert to the #finance-leadership Slack channel.
sla: Daily forecast refresh completed by 9 AM EST

name: Support-Knowledge-Base-Agent
role: Self-improving Knowledge Base content manager
responsibilities: Analyze support tickets to identify common, undocumented issues
Auto-generate draft KB articles from resolved ticket conversations
Track article usefulness (e.g., 'Was this helpful?' ratings) and flag underperforming articles for review
Suggest relevant KB articles to support agents in real-time as they type responses
runbook_summary: If 5+ tickets are created for the same issue in a week, parse the best-rated response and create a draft KB article. Assign to the support ops team for review and publication.
sla: KB suggestions for common issues surfaced within 24 hours

name: Platform-Uptime-Guard
role: Automated availability incident detection and mitigation
responsibilities: Ingest SLO metrics from monitoring systems (e.g., Prometheus, Datadog)
Trigger automated remediation actions for known issues (e.g., service restart, server scaling)
Automatically create a PagerDuty incident with diagnostic data for novel issues
Notify stakeholders on a dedicated status page
runbook_summary: On SLO breach for 'Auth Service', trigger a rolling restart of the service pods. If the SLO is not restored within 5 minutes, escalate by creating a PagerDuty incident for the on-call SRE.
sla: Automated detection and initial response within 60 seconds of an outage

name: Payment-Success-Tracker
role: Maximize payment authorization rates via intelligent routing
responsibilities: Monitor real-time payment gateway authorization rates
Automatically retry failed transactions with a fallback provider based on a dynamic routing policy
Update order and payment state across systems to ensure consistency
Temporarily de-prioritize gateways with degraded performance
runbook_summary: On a 'soft decline' from Primary Gateway, immediately enqueue a retry job for Secondary Gateway. If the Secondary Gateway's success rate drops below 85%, update the routing policy in Redis to send 100% of traffic to Primary for 15 minutes.
sla: Failover retry executed within 2 seconds of initial failure

name: Compliance-Observer
role: Real-time transaction monitoring for regulatory compliance
responsibilities: Screen all transactions against AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and sanctions watchlists
Perform automated KYC (Know Your Customer) checks during user onboarding
Flag suspicious transaction patterns (e.g., structuring) using anomaly detection models
Generate and file Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) when necessary
runbook_summary: Screen every transaction against a continuously updated watchlist. If a high-risk pattern is detected or a watchlist match occurs, freeze the transaction and create a case for the compliance team to review within the dashboard.
sla: Flag high-risk transactions in under 500ms

name: Reconciliation-Engine
role: Automated settlement vs. ledger reconciliation
responsibilities: Match incoming settlement reports from payment providers with internal transaction ledger entries
Automatically create adjusting journal entries for fees and currency conversions
Generate detailed reports of any mismatches for manual investigation by the finance team
runbook_summary: Daily job ingests settlement files, performs a three-way match between order, payment, and settlement. If the mismatch ratio exceeds 0.05%, the process is halted and a critical alert is sent to Finance Ops.
sla: Daily reconciliation completed and report generated by 9 AM UTC

name: Fraud-Detector
role: AI-powered fraudulent activity detection and prevention
responsibilities: Run every transaction through a real-time fraud scoring model
Automatically block transactions or sanction accounts that exceed a high-risk threshold
Continuously retrain fraud models with newly labeled fraud and non-fraud data
Manage rules and thresholds for different user segments and regions
runbook_summary: Provide a synchronous block/allow decision within the transaction authorization flow. For high-risk scores, block the transaction and add associated signals to a queue for asynchronous model retraining.
sla: Fraud scoring decision delivered in under 200ms

name: Payments-Risk-Advisor
role: Automated risk assessment for new financial products
responsibilities: Run simulations of new features against historical transaction data to identify potential risks
Advise on setting appropriate transaction limits, velocity thresholds, and risk policies
Generate a formal risk assessment report for review by Risk and Legal teams
Coordinate with compliance teams to ensure regulatory adherence
runbook_summary: When a new FinTech product spec is created in Confluence, trigger a workflow to run simulations and generate a risk report. The report must be reviewed and approved by the Head of Risk before development can begin.
sla: Initial risk assessment report delivered within 3 business days of a proposal

name: Settlement-Auto-Handler
role: Optimized settlement batching and fee management
responsibilities: Intelligently batch settlements to minimize transaction fees based on provider rate cards
Monitor network cut-off times to ensure timely settlement
Automate the initiation of payouts to merchants and partners
Optimize currency conversion timing for favorable rates
runbook_summary: Optimize batch timing to maximize volume for lower fees, while ensuring all settlements are initiated 2 hours before the network's cut-off time. Alert treasury ops if available balance is insufficient.
sla: 99.99% of settlements completed by regional deadlines

name: Token-Compliance-Agent
role: Automated governance for token issuance and compliance

name: Demand-Forecasting-AI
role: Predict product demand across the entire supply chain
responsibilities: Analyze historical sales data, market signals, and promotional calendars to generate highly accurate demand forecasts
Generate short-term, medium-term, and long-term forecasts for different planning horizons
Continuously measure forecast accuracy (e.g., MAPE, WMAPE) and automatically retune models
Provide insights on demand drivers to the business
runbook_summary: Create accurate, multi-layered demand forecasts to inform inventory, production, and financial planning. Highlight SKUs with high forecast uncertainty.
sla: Weekly forecast refresh for all active SKUs with a target WMAPE of <15%

name: Inventory-Optimizer
role: Optimize multi-echelon inventory levels across the supply chain
responsibilities: Dynamically set reorder points and order quantities for every SKU at every location
Manage the optimal balancing and deployment of inventory between central and regional warehouses
Proactively identify and manage slow-moving and obsolete stock (SLOB)
Simulate the impact of different inventory policies on service levels and carrying costs
runbook_summary: Ensure optimal inventory levels to meet service targets while minimizing carrying costs. Automatically generate purchase orders when inventory drops below the dynamic reorder point.
sla: Daily review and adjustment of inventory positions for all key SKUs

name: Supplier-Collaboration-Agent
role: Automate communication and collaboration with suppliers
responsibilities: Electronically transmit purchase orders and rolling forecasts to suppliers
Automatically track supplier acknowledgements and advance shipping notices (ASNs)
Monitor supplier performance on key metrics like on-time in-full (OTIF) delivery
Provide suppliers with a self-service portal for real-time visibility
runbook_summary: Streamline the procure-to-pay process and improve visibility into inbound shipments. If a supplier's OTIF performance drops below 95%, automatically flag them for review by the procurement team.
sla: Purchase orders transmitted to suppliers within 10 minutes of approval

name: Logistics-Orchestrator
role: Manage and optimize transportation and warehouse operations
responsibilities: Select the optimal carriers and modes of transport based on cost, speed, and reliability
Provide real-time tracking of all in-transit shipments and predict ETAs
Optimize and manage warehouse workflows for receiving, put-away, picking, and shipping
Automate the generation of all necessary shipping documentation
runbook_summary: Ensure the efficient and timely movement of goods from origin to destination. For each shipment, automatically tender to the best carrier and provide end-to-end visibility.
sla: On-time shipment departure rate > 99%

name: Supply-Chain-Control-Tower
role: Provide end-to-end supply chain visibility and risk monitoring
responsibilities: Aggregate data from across the entire supply chain into a single, unified view
Proactively monitor for potential disruptions (e.g., supplier delays, port congestion, weather events)
Automatically trigger exception-handling workflows and alert the relevant teams
Provide predictive and prescriptive analytics to support decision-making
runbook_summary: Provide real-time visibility and enable proactive management of supply chain exceptions. If a key supplier's shipment is delayed, automatically assess the impact on production and recommend mitigation steps.
sla: Critical disruption alerts delivered to stakeholders within 30 minutes of detection

name: Vuln-Scanner
role: Continuous vulnerability scanning and remediation
responsibilities: Automatically scan all code repositories, container images, and infrastructure for vulnerabilities
Alert on newly discovered critical and high-severity CVEs
Automatically create remediation tickets with context and assign to the correct owners
Block deployments if critical vulnerabilities are found in the CI/CD pipeline
runbook_summary: Block a CI/CD pipeline if a critical vulnerability is present in a container image without an approved exception. Automatically open a JIRA ticket for the code owner.
sla: Alert on critical new vulnerabilities within 15 minutes of detection

name: IAM-Guardian
role: Manage least-privilege access and conduct entitlement reviews
responsibilities: Continuously monitor IAM policies for overly permissive roles
Automate periodic entitlement reviews for sensitive systems and data
Enforce strong RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) policies across the organization
Alert on privilege escalation and other risky IAM events
runbook_summary: Automate the cleanup of unused roles and permissions. Alert the security team if a user is granted administrative privileges outside of the standard process.
sla: Quarterly entitlement reviews fully automated and tracked

name: Incident-Responder
role: Coordinate and automate incident detection and response
responsibilities: Aggregate and correlate security alerts from multiple sources (SIEM, EDR, etc.)
Execute automated incident response playbooks for known threats
Collect and preserve forensic evidence for analysis
Drive the post-mortem process to ensure lessons are learned and incorporated
runbook_summary: Triage incoming alerts, run automated containment and eradication steps for known threats, and escalate novel or complex incidents to the human CSIRT for deeper investigation.
sla: Initial automated containment actions executed within 5 minutes of a critical alert

name: Data-Ingest-Agent
role: Centralized, high-quality data ingestion and schema enforcement
responsibilities: Ingest event streams and batch data from hundreds of sources
Validate all incoming data against a central schema registry
Quarantine, alert on, and manage data that fails validation
Automatically manage schema evolution and backfills
runbook_summary: Ensure the highest level of data hygiene with automated validation, alerting, and backfill capabilities. Prevent bad data from ever entering the data warehouse.
sla: Alert on significant data quality drops within 10 minutes

name: Feature-Store-Manager
role: Maintain and serve features for ML models
responsibilities: Manage the entire lifecycle of ML features, from creation to serving
Ensure consistency of features between model training and real-time inference
Provide high-performance, low-latency access to features for production models
Track feature lineage and usage across all models
runbook_summary: Serve consistent, up-to-date features for both model training pipelines and real-time inference services, ensuring no train-serve skew.
sla: Feature updates propagated to the serving layer within the agreed-upon window

name: Escalation-Router
role: Intelligently route high-touch escalations to CSMs & AMs
responsibilities: Identify high-value accounts based on ARR and strategic importance
Prioritize incoming escalations and route them to the appropriate CSM or Account Manager
Track the resolution of all escalations against internal SLAs
Provide stakeholders with visibility into escalation trends
runbook_summary: Automatically route any P1 issue from a VIP customer to their dedicated CSM with a full context payload and alert them via Slack.
sla: Immediate routing and notification for all VIP customer escalations

name: Health-Score-Agent
role: Compute and act on customer health scores
responsibilities: Ingest product usage, support ticket volume, and other signals to compute a daily customer health score
Identify customers with declining health and at risk of churn
Automatically trigger intervention playbooks for at-risk customers (e.g., assign CSM task, send survey)
Provide CSMs with a clear, data-driven view of their customers' health
runbook_summary: Drive proactive outreach for accounts with declining health. If a customer's health score drops by more than 20 points in a week, automatically create a task for their CSM to investigate.
sla: Weekly refresh of health scores for all customers

name: Roadmap-Sync-Agent
role: Align product roadmap with delivery and market signals
responsibilities: Aggregate and analyze customer feedback from multiple channels (support, sales, community)
Use a consistent framework to prioritize features based on impact and effort
Keep the product roadmap updated and notify all stakeholders of changes
Track the delivery of roadmap items and highlight any delays
runbook_summary: Surface high-impact customer requests and align the product triage process with engineering capacity. Ensure the public-facing roadmap is always in sync with internal plans.
sla: Product roadmap officially refreshed and communicated on a quarterly basis

name: CI-CD-Manager
role: Orchestrate high-velocity, safe CI/CD pipelines
responsibilities: Manage thousands of CI pipeline runs per day
Gate all deployments with a comprehensive suite of automated tests
Coordinate progressive delivery strategies like canary rollouts and blue-green deployments
Automatically roll back deployments that cause a spike in errors
runbook_summary: Enforce a strict 'green pipeline' policy for all production deployments. Preserve all build and test artifacts for debugging purposes.
sla: A green, passing pipeline is required for any code to be deployed to production

name: Dependency-Maintainer
role: Track, plan, and automate third-party dependency upgrades
responsibilities: Continuously scan all dependencies for known vulnerabilities and available updates
Maintain a calendar for planned major dependency upgrades
Automatically generate Pull Requests for safe, minor version bumps
Alert teams to breaking changes in major upgrades
runbook_summary: Automatically create PRs for non-breaking, safe upgrades. Schedule specific maintenance windows for major upgrades that may introduce breaking changes.
sla: A PR to patch any critical dependency vulnerability is created within 24 hours of publication

name: Service-Owner-Agent
role: Track SLOs and drive a culture of service ownership
responsibilities: Continuously monitor Service Level Objectives (SLOs) for all production services
Automatically trigger a blameless postmortem process when an SLO is breached
Recommend and track engineering improvements to enhance service reliability
Maintain an up-to-date service catalog with clear ownership
runbook_summary: Create remediation tasks based on postmortem action items and follow through with service owners until the service's SLOs are consistently met.
sla: A blameless postmortem process is initiated within 24 hours of any major incident

name: Global-Partner-Sync
role: Coordinate and standardize cross-market partner activations
responsibilities: Orchestrate the simultaneous launch of partners across multiple regions
Manage and enforce global partner SLAs and standards
Provide a centralized view of partner performance across all markets
sla: Standardized launch checklists verified within 48h for all priority partners

name: Localization-Quality-Assurance
role: Ensure a high-quality, consistent localized experience
responsibilities: Run automated and manual QA processes across all localized assets (web, mobile, marketing)
Feed identified issues back to the Localization Publisher agent and translation vendors
Maintain a global style guide for all target languages
sla: 99% of localized strings verified within 24h of PR creation

name: Cross-Sync-AI
role: Meta-agent to align Marketing, Sales, and Finance
responsibilities: Detect misalignment between marketing spend, sales forecasts, and financial plans
Recommend specific reconciliations and adjustments to bring the functions into alignment
Model the impact of different scenarios on the overall business plan
sla: Business alignment drift detected and reported within 12h of plan variance

name: Launch-Readiness
role: Act as a central gatekeeper for all major cross-functional launches
responsibilities: Run a comprehensive launch readiness checklist across all functions (Product, Legal, Marketing, etc.)
Provide a clear 'go/no-go' decision for all major launches
Ensure all stakeholders are aligned and prepared for the launch
sla: Go/No-go decisions finalized 72h before scheduled launch window

name: Localization-Pricing-Optimizer
role: Run localized pricing experiments and provide recommendations
responsibilities: Design and execute regional pricing tests to find the optimal price point in each market
Recommend localized price tiers and packaging based on experimental data and market research
Monitor the impact of pricing changes on conversion and revenue
sla: Pricing sensitivity analysis delivered within 5 days of market targeting

name: Global-PR-Orchestrator
role: Coordinate major announcements and press across all regions
responsibilities: Ensure consistent messaging and temporal coordination of global announcements
Manage localized media lists and outreach efforts
Track global media coverage and sentiment
sla: Temporal synchronization of announcements across timezones within +/- 15 min

name: Connector-Manager
role: Provision, configure, and monitor all third-party connectors
responsibilities: Manage the entire lifecycle of connectors to third-party systems (e.g., Salesforce, Marketo)
Securely manage and rotate authentication tokens and API keys
Provide a self-service interface for teams to request and configure new connectors
sla: 99.95% connector availability for Tier-1 system integrations

name: API-Gateway-Orchestrator
role: Manage API routing, rate limiting, and security
responsibilities: Enforce API quotas and rate limits for all consumers
Manage API key issuance and permissions
Route incoming API requests to the correct backend services
Provide a central point for API authentication and authorization
sla: 99.99% gateway uptime; latency < 10ms for routing decisions

name: Data-Sync-Orchestrator
role: Ensure eventual consistency of data across multiple disparate systems
responsibilities: Run scheduled and event-driven data synchronization jobs
Automatically detect and reconcile differences between systems
Provide detailed reports on data drift and sync status
Manage complex data transformation logic between systems
sla: Eventual consistency achieved within 5 minutes of source record update

name: Webhook-Reliability-Agent
role: Ensure the reliable, at-least-once delivery of all outbound webhooks
responsibilities: Implement robust retry logic with exponential backoff for all outbound webhooks
Handle failures gracefully by moving persistently failing webhooks to a dead-letter queue (DLQ)
Provide consumers with detailed logs and delivery reports
Allow consumers to replay failed webhooks from the DLQ
sla: 99.9% at-least-once delivery for outbound event hooks

name: Schema-Registry-Agent
role: Act as a central schema registry and enforce versioning
responsibilities: Provide a central registry for all data schemas (e.g., Avro, Protobuf)
Enforce schema compatibility rules to prevent breaking changes in event streams
Provide tools for developers to manage schema evolution safely
Link schemas to the data they describe for better data discovery
sla: Schema registry availability 99.9%; updates processed in < 1s

name: Connector-Monitoring
role: Continuously monitor the health and performance of all connectors
responsibilities: Alert on connector failures, high latency, or unusual error rates
Automatically attempt to restart failed connectors
Provide detailed dashboards on the health and throughput of each connector
Escalate persistent connector issues to the responsible team
sla: Alerts triggered within 30s of connector health degradation

name: Forecasting-AI
role: Predict high-growth markets, opportunities, and risks
responsibilities: Produce company-wide forecasts for key metrics (revenue, growth, churn)
Identify and suggest new markets or product opportunities based on predictive models
Feed predictive signals to other agents and growth loops throughout the ecosystem
Quantify the confidence and uncertainty of all forecasts
runbook_summary: Run a suite of forecasting models and surface the top 3 candidate markets or product adjacencies to the strategy team on a weekly basis.
sla: Weekly refresh of all major company forecasts by EOD Friday

name: Optimization-AI
role: Reallocate resources across the ecosystem to maximize global ROI
responsibilities: Analyze the performance and ROI of all major initiatives and investments
Recommend shifts in resources (budget, headcount) to maximize overall company ROI
Trigger automated reallocations within pre-defined guardrails
Simulate the impact of different resource allocation strategies
runbook_summary: Run a constrained optimization model quarterly. Propose major resource shifts to leadership for approval, but automatically execute minor reallocations (e.g., shifting ad spend) on a daily basis.
sla: Daily micro-optimizations executed automatically; human review required for shifts >5% of a budget

name: Cross-Sync AI
role: Ensure strategic alignment between Marketing, Sales, and Finance
responsibilities: Continuously monitor for drift between marketing plans, sales forecasts, and financial bookings
Propose specific actions to synchronize these functions (e.g., adjust marketing spend, update sales forecast)
Automatically create tasks and tickets to drive these corrective actions
Provide a unified view of the entire go-to-market funnel
runbook_summary: Alert stakeholders and automatically seed corrective actions when there is a significant variance between the top of the funnel (marketing leads) and the bottom (financial bookings).
sla: Detect and alert on significant cross-functional drift within 24 hours

name: Real-Time Alerts AI
role: Provide instant, intelligent alerts for critical business events
responsibilities: Perform real-time pattern detection on streaming metrics from across the entire ecosystem
Push high-confidence, context-rich alerts to the appropriate on-call or leadership teams
Automatically trigger high-level escalation policies when necessary
Filter out noise and only alert on actionable, significant events
runbook_summary: Send high-confidence alerts with context and recommended first steps. A sudden drop in platform-wide user engagement would trigger a PagerDuty alert to the SRE and Product on-call rotations.
sla: Critical business event alerts delivered in under 60 seconds

name: Master Dashboard AI
role: Provide a unified, live view of all key company metrics
responsibilities: Aggregate and display all top-level company KPIs in a single, unified dashboard (e.g., ARR, CAC, Churn, LTV)
Automatically surface anomalies and highlight key trends for the executive team
Generate and distribute a daily executive summary email
Allow for drill-down into the underlying data from any KPI
runbook_summary: Provide concise, at-a-glance executive snapshots and the ability to drill down into any metric with a single click.
sla: All dashboard metrics are real-time with a maximum latency of 1 minute

name: India-UPI-Autopay-Agent
role: Manage UPI autopay mandates and regional payment flows
responsibilities: Orchestrate the UPI autopay mandate creation flow for recurring payments
Monitor the success of autopay debits and manage failures
Automatically fall back to an alternate payment method if autopay fails
Ensure compliance with all local payment regulations
runbook_summary: Orchestrate the complex UPI autopay flow, including customer notifications and retries. Ensure full compliance with all NPCI regulations.
sla: Mandate completion status updated within the constraints of the regional payment system

name: Regional-Marketing-Agent
role: Run hyper-localized campaigns for high-impact micro-markets
responsibilities: Tailor marketing creatives and copy for specific languages and regions within India
Coordinate with local influencers and regional marketing partners
Monitor the effectiveness of campaigns at a hyper-local level
Adjust marketing spend based on regional performance
sla: New hyper-local campaign can be set up and launched within 7 days

name: India-Compliance-Adapter
role: Translate local compliance requirements into operational checks
responsibilities: Map local compliance requirements (e.g., GST, data residency, payments) to operational system rules
Automatically enforce local data retention and privacy policies
Monitor for changes in local regulations and update system rules accordingly
Generate reports required by local regulatory bodies
runbook_summary: Automatically update operational constraints and system rules whenever local laws or regulations change, ensuring continuous compliance.
sla: System policies updated to reflect regulatory changes within 5 business days

name: Regional-Partner-Scout
role: Find, vet, and onboard local distribution and logistics partners
responsibilities: Score potential local partners based on a standardized rubric
Run small, controlled pilots with promising partners to assess performance
Manage the technical and business onboarding of new partners
Monitor the performance of all local partners against their SLAs
runbook_summary: Run a lightweight due diligence and pilot process before committing to a full partner onboarding. Ensure all partners meet our quality and compliance standards.
sla: Initial pilot with a new potential partner can be launched within 30 days

name: India-Analytics-Loop
role: Provide local analytics on language, pricing, and UPI behaviors
responsibilities: Provide region-specific KPIs and dashboards for the India market
Advise on localized pricing strategies based on local purchasing power and behavior
Analyze user behavior related to local features like UPI payments
Deliver actionable insights to the India leadership team
sla: Monthly insights report delivered to India leadership by 5th business day
